MERCHANTNPC.permission-info: Ensure players have selected a character via the Player Configuration (right-click player in bottom left) menu.
MERCHANTNPC.change-item-quantity-help: Change the quantity of the item
MERCHANTNPC.change-price-help: Change the base price of the item
MERCHANTNPC.permission-observer-help: Observer (access to sheet but can only purchase items if merchant sheet type)
MERCHANTNPC.quantityDialog-text: Enter the quantity for the item.
MERCHANTNPC.priceDialog-text: Enter the price for the item.
MERCHANTNPC.sell-price-slider: Use this slider to increase or decrease the price of selling items to this inventory.
MERCHANTNPC.price-slider: Use this slider to increase or decrease the price of all items in this inventory.
MERCHANTNPC.price-slider-help: This uses a percentage factor where 100% is the current price, 0% is 0, and 200% is double the price.
MERCHANTNPC.stack-slider: Use this slider to increase or decrease the number of items in a stack to be sold at a time
MERCHANTNPC.stack-slider-help: This defines how much a stack buy is, where 20 means 20 times the item, 1 is one item, and 100 is 100 times the item.
MERCHANTNPC.error-noGM: No active GM on your scene, they must be online and on the same scene to purchase an item.
MERCHANTNPC.error-playerOtherScene: Player attempted to purchase an item on a different scene.
MERCHANTNPC.error-noToken: You must purchase items from a token.
MERCHANTNPC.error-noFunds: Not enough funds to purchase item.
MERCHANTNPC.error-negativeAmountItems: Can not buy negative amounts of items.
MERCHANTNPC.sell-items-player: Would you like to sell {name} each worth {price}
MERCHANTNPC.csv-import-info: Import by adding the information below. And press update when you are ready to import the CSV input
MERCHANTNPC.csv-import-help: CSV import understands files that are defined with " around the field example "Dagger" and , as seperator and one item per row
MERCHANTNPC.csv-name-field: Which column is the name of item in
MERCHANTNPC.csv-price-field: Which column is the price of item in
MERCHANTNPC.csv-scroll-name-field: What is the name of scrolls in CSV import
MERCHANTNPC.csv-spell-compendium-field: Which compendium is the spell compendium
MERCHANTNPC.pickItemCompendium: Which compendium should items to generate come from
MERCHANTNPC.pickItemCompendium_hint: This will be used for CSV import to take the item from that and find the item from the compendium. At a later stage Randomizer will be added
MERCHANTNPC.invalidQuantity: It is not possible to buy or sell items that does not have a quantity
MERCHANTNPC.csv-item-compendium-field: Which item compendium should the importer use
MERCHANTNPC.csv-item-fallback-field: Item type to use if item is not found in compendium
MERCHANTNPC.info-noGM: The quantity is not changed as the No-GM option is set
MERCHANTNPC.settings-page.keep-item: Keep item when last item sold
MERCHANTNPC.settings-page.services: Change merchant to sell services, items are not moved to player, quantity, weight are not shown
MERCHANTNPC.generator-page.info:
Populate this merchant's inventory with a random number of items from a Rollable
Table or Compendium. Specify first if it should be a Rollable Table or a Compendium with Items, then specify the Rollable Table's / Compendiums  name, along with how a formula for how many times to roll on the table for items
to add (Shop Qty Formula), and a formula for determining how many of each item to add (Item Qty Formula). If both
	are empty 1 will be used. It is also possible to add a formula for generating a price on every item (Price formula),
if no formula is entered the default price on item is used
MERCHANTNPC.change-quantity.info: Change the quantity for all items using this roll formula. If the you use a number that number is set for all items otherwise it will be a roll for each item
MERCHANTNPC.change-quantity.infinity: Otherwise infinity is set for all items
MERCHANTNPC.global-settings.buy-hint: If enabled, a chat message will display purchases of items from the Merchant sheet.
MERCHANTNPC.global-settings.show-stack-h: If enabled, shows the weight of the entire stack next to the item weight.
MERCHANTNPC.global-settings.reduce-updat: If enabled, no notifications will be created every time an item is added to the shop.
MERCHANTNPC.global-settings.no-gm-hint: If enabled, no notifications will be created every time an item is added to the shop.
MERCHANTNPC.global-settings.use-ep-hint: If disabled, EP will not be used and will remove any EP in the purchase or selling.
